snippet: Seven things the U.S. national team has learned during its three recent exhibition games, knowledge that could influence Coach Jurgen Klinsmann's tactics and strategy as the stakes get higher in world Cup qualifying.
abstract: Seven things the U.S. national team has learned during its three recent exhibition games, knowledge that could influence Coach Jurgen Klinsmann's tactics and strategy as the stakes get higher in world Cup qualifying.

headline.main: What Three Exhibitions Taught Us About the U.S. National Team
